page.title: 05LIFE ON A FARM
page.content: The farmers in Denton grow winter wheat,barley,potatoes,sugar beet and tick beans for animals.The crop grown most is winter wheat -- 1000 acres. In a good year they get 4 tons per acre. Barley averages 2.5 -- 2.75 tons per acre.Several varieties of potato are grown,Wilja,Carra,Mari Piper,Desiree and Record that make crisps.The soil is iron stone then clay then silt.When it rains heavily they have to drain the water.A combine harvester would cost Â£60000,a fertiliser machine Â£81000,a machine lifting sugar beet Â£18000 and a potato picker Â£15000. The farmer gets up at 6.30,takes his wife a cup of tea and starts work at 7 o'clock.He tells the men what to do and then sees to the cows.He has breakfast at 8 o'clock.He does the office work and the sees if the men have any problems.
